packets.name: Grid Initiative Oasis 0054
packets.author: Hibero
packets.description:
This is Grid Initiative's Oasis, SN 0054.
This is a procedurally generated, statistically unique VR headset.

Grid Initiative has no plans to remake any of these headsets. In the case that Grid Initiative decides to release increased voxel resolution helmets, the owner will have the option to trade in their current helmet. Note that the lower resolution helmet will be burned and that some characteristics cannot be guaranteed.
